author: mr.mietrich
title: Build out 14 Digital Language Hubs
description: There are not enough digital hubs which serve as a starting point for new people. These are lacking resources to provide active engagement.
solution: Leverage existing projects to create 14 digital hubs and provide some assisting resources for materials and people in precarious situations.
experience: Educhainment team, which is currently building language based digital hubs to collaboratively create a language database + L2-learning game.
